doc.title: Knock
doc.plot: Each year, Scott and Ron go on an adventure somewhere in the world. This year they choose South America and the Machu Picchu area of the Andes mountain range. Scott finds something on the trail that eventually becomes a portal to a world they cannot imagine and once you knock on that door, there is no turning back. Like a bull dog that won't let go, our main character risks everything, to see the adventure through to its ultimate conclusion. It is a beautifully shot story about solving a mystery, the risk-reward ratio and hope. A true "careful what you wish for" saga.
